value.description: The meeting URL, Phone number or Address

metadata.description: Any metadata associated with the booking

recurringEventId.description: Recurring event ID if the event is recurring

seatsPerTimeSlot.description: The number of seats for each time slot

seatsShowAvailabilityCount.description: Show the number of available seats

value.title: Debugging between Syed Ali Shahbaz and Hello Hello

booking.title: 60min between Pro Example and John Doe

400.description:
Bad request
Message Cause
Booking body is invalid Missing property on booking entity.
Invalid eventTypeId The provided eventTypeId does not exist.
Missing recurringCount The eventType is recurring, and no recurringCount was passed.
Invalid recurringCount The provided recurringCount is greater than the eventType recurring config

400.description:
Bad request
Message Cause
Booking not found The provided id didn't correspond to any existing booking.
User not found The userId did not matched an existing user.

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Your API Key

requestBody.description: Create a new event-type related to your user or team

length.description: Duration of the event type in minutes

metadata.description: Metadata relating to event type. Pass {} if empty

slug.description: Unique slug for the event type

isFixed.description: Host MUST be available for any slot to be bookable.

hidden.description: If the event type should be hidden from your public booking page

scheduleId.description: The ID of the schedule for this event type

position.description: The position of the event type on the public booking page

teamId.description: Team ID if the event type should belong to a team

periodType.description: To decide how far into the future an invitee can book an event with you

periodStartDate.description: Start date of bookable period (Required if periodType is 'range')

periodEndDate.description: End date of bookable period (Required if periodType is 'range')

periodDays.description: Number of bookable days (Required if periodType is rolling)

periodCountCalendarDays.description: If calendar days should be counted for period days

requiresConfirmation.description: If the event type should require your confirmation before completing the booking

recurringEvent.description: If the event should recur every week/month/year with the selected frequency

disableGuests.description: If the event type should disable adding guests to the booking

hideCalendarNotes.description: If the calendar notes should be hidden from the booking

minimumBookingNotice.description: Minimum time in minutes before the event is bookable

beforeEventBuffer.description: Number of minutes of buffer time before a Cal Event

afterEventBuffer.description: Number of minutes of buffer time after a Cal Event

schedulingType.description: The type of scheduling if a Team event. Required for team events only

price.description: Price of the event type booking

parentId.description: EventTypeId of the parent managed event

currency.description: Currency acronym. Eg- usd, eur, gbp, etc.

slotInterval.description: The intervals of available bookable slots in minutes

successRedirectUrl.description: A valid URL where the booker will redirect to, once the booking is completed successfully

locations.description: A list of all available locations for the event type

event-type.summary: An example of an individual event type POST request

team-event-type.summary: An example of a team event type POST request

400.description: Bad request. EventType body is invalid.

401.description: Authorization information is missing or invalid.

parameters.description: Slug of the organization that the user belongs to, in case the user belongs to an organization [To be used when not using eventTypeId]

requestBody.description: Create a new user

email.description: Email that belongs to the user being edited

username.description: Username for the user being created

darkBrandColor.description: The new user's brand color for dark mode

hideBranding.description: Remove branding from the user's calendar page

weekStart.description: Start of the week. Acceptable values are one of [SUNDAY, MONDAY, TUESDAY, WEDNESDAY, THURSDAY, FRIDAY, SATURDAY]

timeZone.description: The new user's time zone. Eg- 'EUROPE/PARIS'

theme.description: Default theme for the new user. Acceptable values are one of [DARK, LIGHT]

timeFormat.description: The new user's time format. Acceptable values are one of [TWELVE, TWENTY_FOUR]

locale.description: The new user's locale. Acceptable values are one of [EN, FR, IT, RU, ES, DE, PT, RO, NL, PT_BR, ES_419, KO, JA, PL, AR, IW, ZH_CH, ZH_TW, CS, SR, SV, VI]
